sentences.sContent: financial transactions
financial assistance
a financial advisor
Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.sCn: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.sContent: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.sCn: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

sentences.sContent: ...It's pointless unless there is a repeatable process in place to turn inspiration into financial performance...
...my family needs my financial support...
...At the age of six she started reading the daily financial newspapers and opened her own bank account...
...they may have actually benefited from the financial crisis in the most fundamental way: longer lives...
...The financial sector's share of the economy will shrink...
...They can't afford a financial adviser...
...we may have more elderly people with substantial financial problems in the future...
...They're struggling with much more daily financial demands...
...we may be faced with a financial crisis among elderly...
...After financial disasters family members also tend to do whatever they can to help each other and their communities...
...What's less clear is whether divorce and separation rates rise in a recession – financial pressures mean couples argue more but make splitting up less affordable...
...Older people must be given more chances to learn if they are to contribute to society rather than be a financial burden...
...Trading in financial markets combines both...
...the university publicly stressed that in her previous job she had overseen a major strengthening of Yale’s financial position...
...Such values are more likely to motivate workers than financial targets which ultimately only concern a few people...
...Colleges taking another look at value of merit-based aid Good grades and high tests scores still matter—a lot—to many colleges as they award financial aid...
...Why does the speaker say financial targets are less likely to motivate workers...
...to be discounting the price for families that don’t need financial aid doesn’t feel right any more...

phrases.pCn: 经济援助；助学金；财政补助

words.tran: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动

trans.tranOther: relating to money or the management of money
